entries.npc_1: Who do you work for?  Speak up!
entries.npc_2: Well, that can get you killed.  Do you know what there is around here?
entries.npc_6: Money.  Parts of the Death Star that fell to the planet.  They're worth a lot to the right bidders.  And they're all mine, so stay out of my way and stay out of my people's way.
entries.npc_7: That debris is worth cold hard credits and I intend to cash out.   Just stay out of the way, all right?
entries.npc_3: I don't need to hear it.  As long as you're not here to stop me.
entries.npc_4: Heh.  From collecting my due.  My salvage team is gonna reap the rewards of this stuff.
entries.npc_8: Pieces of the Death Star.  They're ours for the taking.
entries.npc_9: That's right.  I run a tight group here.  We're gonna make a bundle.
entries.npc_5: Good, cause I wouldn't have let you.  And neither would my team.
entries.npc_10: My guys are here to collect salvage, but don't think that means they're pushovers.  They'll take you down if I give the word.  Got it?
entries.npc_11: Me too.  Talk to you later if you live that long.
